article.para: Thank ye for yer interest in Ubuntu 6.06 LTS - the Dapper Drake - lowsit in Juin 2006.

Ubuntu is an haily open source operatin seestem biggit roond aboot the Linux kernel. The Ubuntu commonty is biggit roond aboot the ideals in the Ubuntu Philosophy: that safeware shoud be available free o chairge, that saftware tuils shoud be uissable by fowk in their hamelt leid an mauger ony disabilities, an that fowk shoud hae the freedom tae customise an cheenge their saftware in whitiver wey thay want. For thae reasons:
Ubuntu will aye be free o chairge, an there isna ony extrae fee for the "enterprise edition," we mak oor gey best wark available tae onybody on the same Free terms.
Ubuntu includes the gey best in translations an accessibility infrastructure that the free saftware commonty has tae offer, tae mak Ubuntu uissable for as mony fowk as possible.
Ubuntu is lowsit raiglarly an forespokably; a spleet-new release is makkit ilka sax month. Ye can uiss the current siccar release or the current development release. Ilk release is uphauden for at laist 18 month.
Ubuntu is haily commttit tae the principles o open source saftware development; we forder fowk tae uiss open source saftware, tae haud forrit it an pass it on.
Find oot mair at the Ubuntu wabsite.

sect2.title: Aboot the Name
sect2.para: Ubuntu is a Sooth African ethical ideologu focusing on fowk's allegiances an kin wi ane an ither. The wird comes frae the Zulu an Xhosa leids. Ubuntu (pronooncit "oo-BOON-too") is seen as a tradeetional African concept, is regairdit as ane o the fandin principles o the new republic o Sooth Africa an is connectit tae the idea o an African Renaissance.
A coorse translation o the principle o Ubuntu is "we're aw Jock Tamson's bairns". Anither translation coud be: "the trowe in warldwide wap o sharin that connects aw humanity".

blockquote.para: Somebody wi ubuntu is open an available tae ithers, affirmin o others, disna feel thraitenit that ithers are able an guid, for he or she haes a richt self-assurance that comes frae kennin that he or she belangs in a gey muckle hale an is dimeenishit whan ithers are humiliatit or dimeenishit, whan ithers are torturit or oult."

sect2.para: As a platform foondit on GNU/Linux, the Ubuntu operatin seestem brings the speerit o ubuntu tae the saftware warld.

sect2.title: Free Saftware
sect2.para: The Ubuntu project is haily committit tae the principles o open source saftware development; fowk are encouraged tae uiss open source saftware, haud forrit it, an pass it on. This means that Ubuntu is an will aye be free o chairge.

Houaniver, this means mair than jist bein available at nae cost. The philosophy o free saftware is that fowk shoud be free tae uiss saftware in aw the weys that are "socially uissfu". "Free saftware" disna jist mean that ye shouldna hae tae pey for it, it means that ye shoud be able tae uiss the saftware in ony wey ye want an aw: the code that maks up free saftware is available for onybody tae download, cheenge, mend, an uiss in ony wey. So apairt frae the fact that free saftware is aften available athoor chairge, this freedom haes technical advantages an aw: whan programmes are developit, the haurd wark o ithers can be uised an biggit upon. Wi non-free saftware, this canna happen an whan programs are developit, they hae tae stert frae scratch. For this reason the development o free saftware is fast, feckfu an excitin!
Ye can find oot mair aboot the philosophy o free saftware here.

sect2.title: The Differ
sect2.para: There are mony different operatin seestems foondit on GNU/Linux: Debian, SuSE, Gentoo, RedHat, an Mandriva are ensaumples. Ubuntu is yit anither contender in whit is awreadies a gey competitive warld. Sae, whit maks Ubuntu different?

Foondit on Debian, ane o the maist widely acclaimit, technologically advanced, an weel-supportit distreebutions, Ubuntu aims tae shape a distreebution that provides a modren an coherent Linux seestem for dasktap an server computin. ubuntu includes a nummer o carefully selectit packages frae the Debian distreebution an retains its powerfu package management seestem whit allous eith installation an clean removal o programmes. No like mais distreebutions that are lowsit wi a heap o saftware that micht or micht no be o uiss, Ubuntu's list o packages is reducit tae a nummer o important applications o heich staundart.

By focussin on quality, Ubuntu produces a stench an featurfu computin environs that is fittin for uiss in baith hame an office environs. The project taks the time requirit tae focus on sma'er details an is able tae lowse a version featurin the mais recent an best o today's saftware ance ilka 6 month. Ubuntu is available in flavours for the i386 (386/486/Pentium(II/III/IV) an Athlon/Duron/Sempron processors), AMD64 (Athlon64, Opteron, an new 64-bit Intel processors), an PowerPC (iBook/Powerbook, G4 and G5) architectures.

sect2.title: Lang-Term Upkeep
sect2.para: Ilk Ubuntu release is uphauden for at laist 18 month wi siccarity an ither updates. Ubuntu 6.06 LTS is a speicial enterprise-ready lowse, an is uphauden for 3 year on the dasktap, an 5 year on the server. The development process o Ubuntu 6.06 LTS wis slichtly langer than uisual tae concentrate on a nummer o areas:
The ootcome o this means that it will be possible tae lippen on Ubuntu 6.06 LTS for a langer time than uisual. Sicwice this lowse o Ubuntu is cried "LTS" or "Lang-Term Support".

sect2.title: The Dasktap
sect2.para: The default dasktap environs for Ubuntu is GNOME a chief UNIX an Linux dasktap suite an development platform.

Anither chief UNIX an Linux dasktap is KDE. The Kubuntu project gies Ubuntu uisers anither wale tae the default GNOME dasktap environs. Thanks tae the ettles o the Kubuntu team, Ubuntu uisers are nou able tae insta an uiss the KDE dasktap eithly on thair seestem. Tae git a wirkin insta o Kubuntu on an Ubuntu insta, insta the kubuntu-desktop package. Ance kubuntu-desktop is instawed, ye can chuise tae uiss aither Gnome or KDE dasktap environs.

sect2.title: Version an Lowse Nummers
sect2.para: The Ubuntu version nummerin shame is foondit on the date we lowsit a version o the distreebution. The version nummer comes frae the year an month o the release raither than reflectin the actual version o the saftware. Oor first lowse (Warty Warthog) wis in October 2005 sae its version wis 4.10. This version (Dapper Drake) wis released in Juin 2006, so its version nummer is 6.06 LTS.

sect2.title: Backin an Upkeep
sect2.para: Ubuntu is uphauden by a swith growin commonty. The project is sponsorit by Canonical Ltd., a haudin company foondit by Mark Shuttleworth. Canonical employs the core Ubuntu developers an gies support an consultin services for Ubuntu.
Canoncial Ltd sponsors a nummer o ither Open Source saftware projects an aw, aboot which mair speirins can be fund on the Canonical wabsite.

sect2.title: Whit is Linux?
sect2.para: The Linux kernel, pronouncit 'lee-nucks' is the hert o the Ubuntu operatin seestem. A kernel is an important pairt o ony operatin seestem, providin the communication brig atween haurdware an saftware.

Linux wis born in 1991 by a Finnish scholart cried Linux Torvalds. At the time, it woud run only on i386 seestems, an wis essentially an independently shapit clone o the UNIX kernel, intendit tae tak advantage o the then new i386 architecture.
Thir days, thanks tae a muckle amoont o development effort by fowk aw aroond the warld, Linux runs on awmaist ilka modren architecture.

The Linux kernel haes win an ideological importance on top o a technical ane. Thare is a hail commonty o fowk wha trowe in the ideals o free saftware an spend thair time helpin tae mak open source technology as guid as it can be.

Fowk in this commonty gie rise tae initiatives sic as Ubuntu, staundarts comatees that shape the development o the Interwab, organisations like the Mozilla Foondation, responsible for shapin Mozilla Firefox, an coontless ither saftware projects frae whit ye've certaintly gainit frae in the past.
The speerit o open source, for common attributit tae Linux, is influencin saftware developers an uisers awwhaur tae drive commonties wi common goals.

sect2.title: Whit is GNU?
sect2.para: The GNU Project, pronouncit “guh-noo”, wis foondit in 1984 tae develop a hail UNIX style operatin seestem comprised o free saftware: the GNU seestem. Variants o the GNU operatin seestem, that uise the Linux kernel, are nou widely uised; but thae seestems are aften cried “Linux,” whan thay're mair accurately cried GNU/Linux seestems.
The GNU project is closely relatit tae the philosophy o free saftware, that is at the hert o tae the projects that come frae it, sic as Ubuntu. The concept o free saftware is exponit at .

sect1.title: Parteecipate in Ubuntu
sect1.para: The Ubuntu commonty is makkit up o saftware developers, documentation screivers, translators, graphic airtists, an maist importantly, the fowk wha are uisin Ubuntu in thair ilkaday lives. We bid ye tae jyne this commonty an help shape Ubuntu intil an operatin seestem that daes mair o whit ye want.

Ye dinna hae tae be a saftware developer tae help better Ubuntu. Ye can parteecipate by translatin Ubuntu intil yer ain leid, test is on dasktaps, laptaps, an servers, help better the Ubuntu wab site wi guides an atips for uisers, answer quaistens on the forum or mailin lists, contreebute airtwirk, an mair. Ony contreebution, muckle or wee, will shape the futur o Ubuntu for aw o us. Tae find oot hou tae parteecipate, gang tae this wabpage!
Read mair aboot Ubuntu an its growin commonty at www.ubuntu.com.
